title: Honestly, Katie John!
description: In the third Katie John book, all the sixth grade girls becomes boy crazy except Katie John. In self defense, she loudly declares that she hates boys and becomes a leader of the Boy-Haters Club. This hurts the feelings of her friend Edmund, who no longer wants to spent time with her. How can she remain true to herself without offending all her friends?
author: Mary Calhoun
